00033 
00034 
00035 #include <avr/io.h>
00036 #include "leds.h"
00037 #include "helpers.h"
00038 
00039 /** turn on the given led 
00040  * @param led number of the led to turn on (0-3)
00041  * @return -1 if led has illegal value, 0 else
00042  */
00043 int set_led( char led )
00044 {
00045 
00046         if( (led <0) || (led > 3) )
00047                 return -1;
00048 
00049         PORTC = PORTC | (1<<led);
00050         return 0;
00051 }
00052 
00053 /** turn off the given led 
00054  * @param led number of the led to turn off (0-3)
00055  * @return -1 if led has illegal value, 0 else
00056  */
00057 int clear_led( char led )
00058 {
00059         if( (led <0) || (led > 3) )
00060                 return -1;
00061         
00062         PORTC = PORTC & ~(1<<led);
00063         return 0;
00064 }
00065 
00066 /** toggle the given led 
00067  * @param led number of the led to toggle (0-3)
00068  * @return -1 if led has illegal value, 0 else
00069  */
00070 int toggle_led( char led )
00071 {
00072         if( (led <0) || (led > 3) )
00073                 return -1;
00074         
00075         PORTC = PORTC ^ (1<<led);
00076 
00077         return 0;
00078 }
00079 
00080 /** led the leds 1 and 3 fade in and out.
00081  * BEWARE: this functions uses busy waiting and wastes a
00082  * huge amount of cpu-time!
00083  */
00084 void led_pwm_fade( void )
00085 {
00086         int i;
00087         int o;
00088                 /* heartbeat */
00089                 for (i=0; i<20; i++)
00090                 {       
00091                         for( o=0; o<5; o++)
00092                         {
00093                                 toggle_led(3);
00094                                 toggle_led(1);
00095                                 delay_ms(i);
00096                                 toggle_led(3);
00097                                 toggle_led(1);
00098                                 delay_ms(20-i);
00099                         }
00100                 }
00101                 toggle_led(1);
00102                 toggle_led(3);
00103 }
